title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Dave Wannstedt on Trubisky/Steelers Optimism, Bears Direction, Belichick 2nd Guessing, Randy Gregory --> DEN, NFL Draft Stories
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Dave Wannstedt on Trubisky/Steelers Optimism, Bears Direction, Belichick 2nd Guessing, Randy Gregory --> DEN, NFL Draft Stories
description:
Colin explains which under-the-radar team makes sense for Deshaun Watson, what move by the Seahawk front office showed the franchise was in trouble, and why Bill Belichick's 'Patriot Way' with personnel moves

Then, former Bears & Dolphins HC and Cowboys DC Dave Wannstedt and Colin discuss why Dave is more bullish on Mitch Trubisky to the Steelers than most (11:00), which free agency signing helped put the 90's Cowboys over the top (20:00), if Bill Belichick deserves the benefit of the doubt for some heavily criticized personnel moves with JC Jackson and Shaq Mason (23:00), how Randy Gregory's free agency signing can impact Denver's defense (29:00), if the Bears have reason for optimism with a new coach and GM (31:00), which player blew him away in pre draft interviews (34:00), which player was his biggest miss (38:00), and draft stories from his time with Jimmy Johnson and the Cowboys (39:00), and the unique way his longtime friend Norv Turner interviewed with Jimmy Johnson for the Cowboys OC job (41:00).

Make sure to Subscribe and follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
